4.55 stars (10 Ratings)
10 Psychic Source member reviews since Mar 2012

05/14/2013 with Simone 4½ stars Phone Reading

First time speaking with Ricky and definitely felt I was speaking with an old friend. He is highly accurate and was spot on. Some things does not make sense at the moment but I am sure it will all fall in place as he said. Now waiting for prediction to pass and will definitely speak to Ricky again. Thank you Ricky! Blessings!

Was this review helpful? YES

01/20/2015 with Desjjmo 5 stars Phone Reading

What can I even say about Ricky... He is quite amazing. I have to say, and I'm sure he picks up that every time I call I'm skeptical. As much as I beliieve, I also don't believe. But this man has told me some crazy things that have come to fruition!! My situation is quite interesting, and I can't imagine very easy for anyone to read. But, Ricky somehow does it. I have to say the very last prediction he made to me I actually shook my head and thought no way that's never gonna happen. Well, I spoke to him on a Monday and it happened that Friday. I was so shocked that i actually felt ill for about 2 days!! Anyway, Ricky you're awesome and I LOVE speaking to you and hearing what you have to say... Have an awesome day!!! P.s.... I don't usually leave reviews.. :)

Was this review helpful? YES

01/15/2015 with Chocolatedrop 4½ stars Chat Reading

waiting for prediction to happen before posting my testimony.

Was this review helpful? YES

01/13/2015 with flower1048 3½ stars Chat Reading

This is my third reading with Ricky and it will not be my last. He always remembers me and our prior readings. I was feeling empty and a little out of sorts, Really did not know which way to turn. Within 10 minutes of our last read he had put my heart and mind at ease. Ricky is understanding and very compassionate. He truly does see things and tells you exactly as he sees everything good or bad. One of his predictions came to pass and he really hit the nail on the head even with the two delays. Once again he told me things that I would only know. He has such a gentle and soothing voice and really takes an interest in your situation. Ricky is truly happy when your predictions come to fruition. I am praying that the next few major predictions happen exactly as he does see it. I ended our call with a lighter heart and a better frame of mind. I will update and will most definitely be calling Ricky again. The only person that I was ever able to talk to about everything was my mom who has passed away. I have found the next best to my mom. Ricky, you are a treasured angel and I thank you from the bottom of my heart. I will never speak to anyone but him, feels like I have known him all my life. God Bless You!!!!!

Was this review helpful? YES

01/08/2015 with RickyIsTheBest 5 stars Chat Reading

Ricky, my brother you are one of the very special soul that touched my heart through your kindness. My life and forthcoming would not be the same without your guidance and love. You’re genuine and you care about your clients, there is no better human being that empathize with others and help them in their tough times and intern no better blessing. You have been accurate with your readings and I would never read with anyone other than you. I just wish you to come online a bit more for those who truly seek your help. Best Wishes

Was this review helpful? YES

01/07/2015 with creatorjp 5 stars Chat Reading

This was my first reading and Ricky was very compassionate and super accurate. The real deal and well worth the wait! He even knew about an upcoming dental appointment which is my only health appointment left for this month. He also knew the exact state for 2 upcoming trips as well as one I took in November. I look forward to updating Ricky and all of you when his predictions come to pass. Thank you for such a lovely connection and I look forward to our next chat. Johanna

Was this review helpful? YES

Am not sure.
